items.name: npm
items.description: The default package manager for Node.js with a vast ecosystem of open-source packages.

items.name: Yarn
items.description: Yarn is a package manager that doubles down as project manager. Whether you work on simple projects or industry monorepos, whether you're an open source developer or an enterprise user, Yarn has your back.

items.name: pnpm
items.description: A fast, disk space-efficient package manager that uses symlinks to save space
